text.style: fill: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0); font-family: Cousine; font-size: 670px; paint-order: fill; stroke: rgb(186, 218, 85); white-space: pre; visibility: hidden;

line.style: stroke: url('#color-0'); stroke-width: 12px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 28; fill: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0);

path.style: stroke: url('#gradient-0'); stroke-dasharray: 33px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 12px; fill: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0);
